answers.answer: It depends on the cause of your hypoglycemia.  Hypoglycemia can be transient, simply because you don't eat enough or often enough or there can be an issue with the way your body absorbs the food you eat. If you don't eat often enough, you simply have to make sure you eat enough at meal time or eat multiple healthy meals/day in order to keep your blood glucose levels high enough.I used to have hypoglycemia and it's now switched over to pre-diabetes... so yes, it can go away.

question: 2 years ago, I found out I have hypoglycemia (low blood sugar) I was wondering if it can ever actually go away or be cured. Lots of people have told me different things, but I want to know whether or not it can really go away or be cured!
title: Can Hypoglycemia go away?
